Class ProfileListArrayAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Profile>
com.example.slacks_lottoevent.ProfileListArrayAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class ProfileListArrayAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Profile>
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying profiles in a ListView.

      Constructor for the ArrayAdapter.
      Parameters:
      context - The current context.
      profiles - The list of profiles to display.
      isAdmin - Boolean flag for admin functionality.
      facilities - Shared list of facilities.
      facilitiesAdapter - Adapter for facility views.
      eventList - Shared list of events.
      eventsAdapter - Adapter for event views.
